@g-apple --the audio is fine.
@g-apple....my bad....audio is fine for 1st part, 2nd part has no sound.

@ "anders055"

Thanks for assurance that audio isn't fine. 
Yet, I'd like to thank Malikjee on behalf of  everyone of us collecting rare gems of Indian Cinema.
found a temporary solution for the audio on the 2nd part.....used media player classic....there is a large amount of noise but dialogues can be clearly heard.
